resources.string: "Welcome to Baby Immunization Tracker - easy way to keep track of your baby health. ◦Reference : Indian Academy Of Pediatrics. ◦Get Feeding Tips. ◦Keep Immunization track record. ◦Email the baby Immunization chart. ◦Learn about baby Immunization Vaccines. ◦Learn about baby Vaccines Details."
*Disclaimer : This app should be used in consultation with your doctor.This application gives you the generic Information.

"These are general guidelines for feeding healthy babies. Feed your baby only one new food per week. Then you can find out if your baby has a problem with the new food. Talk with the nutritionist or health care provider for more information on feeding your baby. "

"Haemophilus Influenzae Type B (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Menangitis,which affect membranes surrounding the brain and the spinal cord. • Important info -: ◦ There may be slight redness,swelling or pain at the injected site. "

" Bacillus Calmette Guerin (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Tuberculosis. • Important info -: ◦ The BCG vaccine can prevent tuberculosis (TB) bacteria from spreading within the body, thus preventing the disease from developing. "

" HepatitisA (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Liver function caused by HAV(Hepatitis A virus). • Important info -: ◦ Since Hepatitis A is common in young children.It is advisable to get the vaccination done.. "
"HepatitisB (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Liver infection caused by Hepatitis B virusd. • Important info -: ◦ Essentional within 12 Hours of birth to prevent transmission from mother."
"DPT(Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Diptheria(upper respiratory illness),Pertussis(Whooping Cough) and Tetanus. • Important info -: ◦ There may be mild fever,pain and swelling at the injected site. "
" Influenza (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Influenza virus,which causes infection of the respiratory system. • Important info -: ◦ The most common vaccine is Trivalent Influenza Vaccine(TIV). "
" Typhoid (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Typhoid ,a fever caused by Typhoid bacillus. • Important info -: ◦ There are two types of Typhoid vaccines- Inactivated Vaccine(Shot) and Weakened Vaccine. "
" Varicella (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Chickenpox. • Important info -: ◦ Varicella is the primary vaccine for chickenpox. "

" Rotavirus (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Rotavirus infection,which causes severe Diarrhoea among infants. • Important info -: ◦ A rotavirus vaccine protects children from rotaviruses, which are the leading cause of severe diarrhea among infants and young children. [1], Each year an estimated 453,000 children die from diarrhoeal disease caused by rotavirus, [2], most of whom live in developing countries, [3] and another two million are hospitalised. [4] Rotavirus is highly contagious and resistant and, regardless of water quality and available sanitation nearly every child in the world is at risk of infection. "
" Pneumococcal (Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ Pneumococcal disease,caused by Strept. • Important info -: ◦ There may be mild fever,pain and swelling at the injected site. "

" Oral Polio Vaccine (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Poliomyelitis(Polio),which damages nervous system,causes muscle weakness or paralysis. • Important info -: ◦ Given for free in Govt. hospitals up to the age of 5 yrs. "
" MMR (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Measles,Mumps,Rubella. • Important info -: ◦ There might be slight fever,joint pain or stiffness after the vaccination. "

" Measles (Mandatory) • Prevents -: ◦ Measles,which causes infection of the respiratory system. • Important info -: ◦ Highly contagious disease.Hence its very important to get the vaccination done on time.. "

" Inactivated Polio Vaccine(Optional) • Prevents -: ◦ (PCV) is a pneumococcal vaccine used to protect infants and young children against disease caused by the bacterium Streptococcus pneumoniae (pneumococcus). • Important info -: ◦There are currently three PCV vaccines available on the global market: Prevnar (called Prevenar in some countries), Synflorix and Prevnar 13. "
" We are mobile app developers. We provide mobile apps development of all types:native, web apps and hybrid on iPhone, Android and Blackberry platforms. ."
